summary: This module provides utilities to read, clean, and interpret Terraform configuration expressed in JSON (and optionally YAML) format. It loads raw file content, normalizes simple scalar and list structures, determines block types, and prepares a definition dictionary that can be consumed by the Terraform graph builder for further analysis.
business_intent: Enable Checkov to ingest Terraform JSON/YAML files, transform them into a consistent internal representation, and support downstream security and compliance checks.
